Articles.Content:
I think all my newest recruits have rather promising names.

Now that I think about it, "Chad Strider" would probably have sounded catchier.

Edited January 2, 2014 by Felsmak

I've had a Samwise, and a Dildo. Not on the same mission, unfortunately .

My current favorite is Buzz. He does all the dangerous stuff. I think the list of premade names should include all astronauts (and kosmonauts?), though. That way we could have Christer and Story!
I just got Jim Kerman. Max courage, max... Stupid... So he's smart.... Right?

Guess who is 'flying' my Triebflugel

'Dude, please, let's both of us stop trying to justify this whole thing and admit you're in danger!'

'Who are you talking to right now?Who is it you see?Do you know how much i produce per year?I mean, even if i told you about my projects, you wouldn't believe it.Do you know what would happen if I suddenly decided to stop going into work?A business with contraptions crazy enough to make even Jebediah jealous goes belly up.Disappears!It ceases to exist without me.No, you clearly don't know who you're talking to, so let me clue you in. I am not in danger, Bill.I am the danger.A guy tries to test my contraptions and he gets blown to pieces and you think of me?No.I am the one who flies!'

Jim Kerman.

Cheers,mate!

I've had Billy-Bobler Kerman and Derski Kerman

My favorites that have come up in my astronaut pool are so far Al Kerman and Doodski Kerman.

Sadly I lost both of them to a vicious stall in an SSTO on reentry. I have since learned to install contingency abort systems on all my SSTOs and make strategic use of F5 and F9.

My favorites that have come up in my astronaut pool are so far Al Kerman and Doodski Kerman.

http://i.imgur.com/q7rg7UJ.png

http://i.imgur.com/IAAUDBj.png

Sadly I lost both of them to a vicious stall in an SSTO on reentry. I have since learned to install contingency abort systems on all my SSTOs and make strategic use of F5 and F9.

Imagine how hilarious it would be if Al came back as a soul is a spacesuit.

The ones named after real astronauts are my faves. Since 0.19, I've had Gus (Grissom), Jim (Lovell), Buzz (Aldrin) and Frank (Borman). I've also currently got a Lars, but I don't know who he's named after.
I one got a Kerbin Kerman. Ironic? My favorite is probably Neilburry.

Munwise kerman.

Sadly, he got stuck on the island runway and i forgot about him.
Billy-Bobbles Kerman, he was featured and slaughtered by danny2462

It's unlikely, but you could get Bilbo, Samwise, and/or Merry Kerman. Then you'd be obligated to have them launch the One Decoupler into the heart of the sun.

I have Bilbo Kerman! Ah, now I have to wait and get Samwise and Merry Kerman and do that.
For me, Tancal and Lugee Kerman, because they were the pilots of my first Mun mission (Not of all time, just the most recent save), and Bilbo Kerman!

I love my Kerbals named Gerrim, Seekin and Kelrie Kerman. They've been on a lot of flights, and their names are very "kerbal."

I've even used their names in my KSP fan-fic.
We need to have female Kerbals! Valentina Kermin: 10th Kerbal to go to space. Ellen Kipley: alien hunter. I must admit, I once spawned a "Montgomery McKermin" using Ship Manifest.
Munmund Kerman

Billy Bobbald Kerman

First Hill-Billy to the Mun.
I got a Roford Kerman. Surprisingly close to a certain mayor of my hometown.
With one of my new 0.24 saves I was presented with a "Dunny Kerman" and a "Rofal Kerman" (dunny being Australian slang for toilet and Rofal because it sounds like ROFL, they amused me ).
Dannie Kerman. I don't know why, but I laugh every time I see his name!
Kermin Kerman
Wehrly Kerman would be awesome.
Broseta Kerman
So where is the file that the names are picked from?

I have three Kerbals I hired at the same time, just because their names work so well together.

Lemster Kerman - the most sane of the three

Leuny Kerman

Lolo Kerman

I hand-picked them to man my orbital Mun station, and they're still there.
